duck: Hospital - A hospital is a health care institution providing patient treatment by specialized staff and equipment.
The Hospitality Branch, a tributary of the Great Egg Harbor River in southeastern New Jersey
Hospitality refers to the relationship between a guest and a host, wherein the host receives the guest with goodwill.
Hospitality service, a centrally-organized social network wherein travelers and tourists exchange accommodation without monetary exchange
hospitality definition: hospitable treatment, reception, or disposition.
The hospitality industry, an umbrella term for several service industries including hotels, food service, casinos and tourism
Hospitality (band), a Brooklyn, NY band on Merge Records.

wiki.text:
, the boar's head was sometimes used as symbol of hospitality, often seen as
representing the host's willingness to feed guests well.<ref name=Wade></ref> It
is likewise the symbol of a number of inns and taverns.<ref></ref>]]
'Hospitality' is the relationship between the guest and the host, or the act or
practice of being hospitable. This includes the reception and entertainment of
guests, visitors, or strangers.
wiki.title: hospitality
